mapper.select: select product.*,pt.`name` AS typeName from product JOIN product_type pt on pt.id = product.product_type_id where NOW() > product.expiration_begin_time and product.expiration_time >= NOW() and product.status in (1,2) and pt.id = #{id} ORDER BY product.sort_num

select pt.`name` ,product.*,ex.plate from investor_product_config as upc left JOIN product on product.short_code = upc.product_code JOIN product_type pt on pt.id = product.product_type_id JOIN exchange_info as ex on product.exchange_id=ex.id where NOW() > product.expiration_begin_time and product.expiration_time >= NOW() and product.status in (1,2) and upc.investor_account_id = #{investorId} and pt.id=#{id} ORDER BY product.sort_num
